
VERSION
-------

This is the BBComp client software, version 1.2.1.


VERSION HISTORY
---------------

Version 1.2.1 (released ??.02.2017)
changes:
(*) small bug fixed related to the GVGPC track on Windows systems

Version 1.2.0 (released 16.01.2017)
changes:
(*) internal changes related to the real-world problems track
(*) added definition of numberOfObjectives in client_python_full

Version 1.1.2 (released 03.06.2016)
changes:
(*) added a Python 3 client
(*) fixed a bug in the Windows client that prevented connecting to the
	competition server.

Version 1.1.1 (released 21.02.2016)
changes:
(*) internal bug fixes

Version 1.1.0 (released 17.02.2016)
changes:
(*) interface extended to multi-objective problems by introducing the
	new function numberOfObjectives and by extending the functions
	evaluate and history.
(*) Example clients extended to multi-objective tracks.


Version 1.0.6 (released 06.03.2015)
changes:
(*) changed the competition port from 6881 to 39772 to avoid problems with
	firewalls attempting to block bit-torrent clients

Version 1.0.5 (released 23.02.2015)
changes:
(*) updated MSVC libraries, fixing library loading problems with the Matlab
    client on Windows

Version 1.0.4 (released 15.01.2015)
changes:
(*) minor bugs fixed in the advanced Python example client

Version 1.0.3 (released 10.01.2015)
changes:
(*) fixed a minor bug related to the internal state of the library
(*) added more client code examples implementing the Nelder Mead algorithm

Version 1.0.2 (released 17.12.2014)
changes:
(*) minimal changes internal to the black box library, related only to logging

Version 1.0.1 (released 14.12.2014)
bug fix release - changes:
(*) string comparison bugs fixed in the Java client

Version 1.0.0 (released 30.11.2014)
first release version - features:
(*) dynamic library
(*) TCP/IP proxy
(*) C client
(*) C++ client
(*) Java client
(*) Python client
(*) Matlab client
